data.name: YouTube VR
data.detailed_description: YouTube VR reimagines YouTube as a 3D world you can explore. Experience every channel, video and creator in virtual reality. Swim alongside great white sharks, explore all seven continents with your own personal tour guide, get front row seats at your favorite concerts and more. Be at the center of the action with both 360-3D and VR180 videos as well as standard rectangular settings.
data.about_the_game: YouTube VR reimagines YouTube as a 3D world you can explore. Experience every channel, video and creator in virtual reality. Swim alongside great white sharks, explore all seven continents with your own personal tour guide, get front row seats at your favorite concerts and more. Be at the center of the action with both 360-3D and VR180 videos as well as standard rectangular settings.
data.short_description: YouTube VR reimagines YouTube as a 3D world you can explore. Experience every channel, video and creator in virtual reality. Swim alongside great white sharks, explore all seven continents with your own personal tour guide, get front row seats at your favorite concerts and more.
data.supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Czech, Dutch, Greek, Japanese, Norwegian, Portuguese, Romanian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Turkish, French, German, Bulgarian, Danish, Finnish, Hungarian, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-6400 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980, AMD Radeon R9 Fury equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980ti or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

data.legal_notice: By using this application, you agree to be bound by our YouTube Terms of Service (https://www.youtube.com/t/terms) and Privacy Policy (http://www.google.com/intl/policies/privacy/).
